name: Kung Fu Volleyball
description:
*** Selection Boston Festival of Indie Games ***

*** Selection Toronto Long Winter Arcade ***

*** Selection Winnipeg Fortuna's Arcade ***

Chaos, destruction, war, the world has fallen to despair. Within the ruins a brutal sport has been born: KUNG FU VOLLEYBALL! Using powers of flight, teleportation, and kicking, combatants prove their worth in this 2 player competitive sports game. Will you be the next KFV champion?

Kung Fu Volleyball is a local 2 player competitive jam game by KO-OP.

Bonus 4 track EP by Mars Module & Wallpapers (1$+)

Requires 2 Xbox 360 controllers
